name: Daily ATR-Filtered Engulfing Strategy
description: Trades mid-cap U.S. equities on daily bars using confirmed Bullish/Bearish Engulfing candlestick patterns. A 20-day ATR must be above its 30-day SMA to validate any entry. Longs are opened on Bullish Engulfing, shorts on Bearish Engulfing. Hard stop at 1.5× ATR, 10 % trailing exit handled within platform, and take-profit at 2× ATR. Position risk is capped at 3 % of equity per trade via fixed-fraction sizing.
